sources.title: Casus Kiran (Spy Smasher)
sources.description: Casus Kiran is a Turkish movie from 1968. It was directed by Yilmaz Atadeniz and stars Irfan Atasoy and Sevda Fenda. I'm not exactly sure what the plot is about, but it's chock full of action. It is in Turkish with English subtitles. I would recommend this to any fan of cult movies.

metadata.Plot: Edited version of the 1942 Republic serial "Spy Smasher," cut down to one hour and sold for TV release in 1966 in a syndication package with other truncated Republic serials.
metadata.Actors: Kane Richmond, Marguerite Chapman, Sam Flint
